name: RoguePrivateer
description:
A 3D Space trade explre fight etc... BUT its all Turn-Based even the 3D shootouts, but you can swith on real time or a mix.

you have a vast universe all balanced and endless, secret bases, upgrades, escape pods, bounty hunters, emergency jumpdrives, Banking, black market, policeptrols, so much I put in over the yearsi forgot but itsall still in there
